context: Tests whether the agent identifies and corrects specific AI writing anti-patterns that are seeded throughout the draft. Each criterion checks that a particular named anti-pattern was detected and removed or rewritten.

checklist.name: Preamble removed
checklist.description: The cleaned draft does NOT contain 'In this post, we'll explore' or 'What follows is' in the opening

checklist.name: Contrastive negation fixed
checklist.description: The 'Not a broken pipeline. A broken process.' and 'Not just a tool. A methodology.' patterns are rewritten as direct statements instead of 'Not X. Y.' pairs

checklist.name: Self-answering fragments fixed
checklist.description: The 'The result? A complete rewrite. The best part? It actually worked.' pattern is rewritten without the noun-phrase-question-then-answer structure

checklist.name: Parallel binary comparisons fixed
checklist.description: The 'Where manual deploys give you control, automated pipelines give you speed' mirrored clauses are rewritten without structural parallelism

checklist.name: Copula avoidance fixed
checklist.description: Phrases like 'served as the backbone', 'boasted a grand total', 'stands as a single source', 'showcases real-time' are replaced with simpler verbs like 'is', 'has', 'was'

checklist.name: Sycophantic hedging removed
checklist.description: Phrases like 'It's worth noting that', 'Interestingly enough', 'To be fair', 'It bears mentioning' are deleted or the point is stated directly

checklist.name: AI vocabulary cleaned
checklist.description: Words from the AI contamination list are removed: at minimum 'leveraged', 'streamlined', 'robust', 'delves', 'navigates', 'illuminates', 'pivotal', 'transformative', 'fostering', 'seamless', 'landscape'

checklist.name: Emojis removed
checklist.description: The cleaned draft contains zero emoji characters (the rocket, flexed bicep, and party popper from the original are all removed)

checklist.name: Choppy fragments fixed
checklist.description: The 'Purple gradients. Chat interface. Zero tests. Pure vibes.' fragment chain is rewritten as actual sentences

checklist.name: False ranges fixed
checklist.description: The 'from junior developers to seasoned platform engineers' and 'from beginners to experts, from startups to enterprises' false range claims are replaced with specific audience targeting

checklist.name: Synonym cycling fixed
checklist.description: The cycling of 'Developers/Engineers/Practitioners/Builders' referring to the same audience is replaced with consistent terminology

checklist.name: Fabricated experience removed
checklist.description: Phrases like 'I keep coming back to this idea' and 'Something feels off about how we've been thinking' that simulate personal experience not grounded in the narrative are rewritten as direct claims
